tool_description: An API showing all the latest IPL News around the world.
name: Latest IPL News
title: Latest IPL News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about IPL from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-ipl-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-ipl-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-ipl-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-ipl-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All IPL News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about IPL from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-ipl-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-ipl-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-ipl-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-ipl-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

IPL 2023 complete list of awards: The winners of Orange cap, Purple Cap and other awards TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 30, 2023, 11:06 (IST) After 74 matches spread across two months and involving 10 teams, the 2023 edition of the Indian Premier League saw Chennai Super Kings being crowned the champions for the fifth time, which brought MS Dhoni's team level with Mumbai Indians, who have also won the title five times.

CSK vs. GT: Lokesh Kanagaraj, Anirudh Ravichander, Arun Vijay, Trisha, and other Kollywood celebrities blow whistles as Dhoni and his team lift their fifth IPL championship etimes.in / May 30, 2023, 10:44 (IST) IPL 2023 season has come to an end, while Chennai Super Kings defeated Gujarat Titans to clinch their 5th title. Kollywood stars couldn't keep themselves calm over the last ball victory of CSK and they praises the home team on social media.

The money's nice, but I'd love to play 100 Test matches: Mitchell Starc on IPL TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jun 06, 2023, 13:25 (IST) A no show in the Indian Premier League since 2015, Australia's premier pacer Mitchell Starc said that he has not been featuring in the world's biggest T20 league to prolong his international career. Starc, who played a couple of seasons for Royal Challengers Bangalore in 2014 and 2015 said that the money is nice in the T20 spectacle but he would prefer playing 100 Tests for Australia.

IPL betting racket busted, 3 arrested PTI / May 31, 2023, 08:04 (IST) Three men have been arrested for allegedly betting on the IPL final man between Chennai Super Kings and Gujarat Titans, police said on Tuesday.

Twitter Goes Crazy for MS Dhoni and Ravindran Jadeja as CSK lifts fifth IPL Trophy TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 30, 2023, 17:00 (IST) Chennai Super Kings emerged victorious in the IPL tournament for the fifth time, leading fans to express their support on social media platforms. Ravindra Jadeja played an important role in the CSK victory

CSK vs GT: 'Being more calm is much better' - Sai Sudharsan reflects on his 96 in ipl final TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 30, 2023, 13:05 (IST) Sai Sudharsan's sensational knock in the IPL 2023 final between Gujarat Titans and Chennai Super Kings may not have resulted in a win for GT, but his skills and calmness once again put the spotlight on him as one of the batters who could go on to don the India jersey.

'This is the biggest news': Harbhajan Singh on MS Dhoni not ruling out playing one more IPL season TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 30, 2023, 12:16 (IST) Speaking on MS Dhoni's decision to wait 6-7 months and see if his body allows him to play another season of the IPL, former India and Chennai Super Kings' off-spinner Harbhajan Singh expressed confidence that Dhoni will come back to play one more edition of the T20 league.

CSK vs GT, IPL 2023 final: Ravindra Jadeja dedicates Chennai Super Kings' title win to MS Dhoni TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 30, 2023, 10:31 (IST) The scenes of Chennai Super Kings' captain MS Dhoni lifting Ravindra Jadeja after the all-rounder's match-winning cameo in the IPL 2023 final against Gujarat Titans will remain etched in memory forever. And with Dhoni's participation in another IPL season not certain, Jadeja dedicated the win to the talismanic CSK skipper.

'It will be a gift from me': MS Dhoni hasn't ruled out playing another IPL season TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 30, 2023, 09:40 (IST) The talismanic MS Dhoni led CSK to a record-equalling fifth IPL title on Monday, beating Gujarat Titans on the rain-curtailed reserve day of the final after bad weather didn't allow any play on Sunday. The 41-year-old Dhoni wants to see how his body responds in the next 6-7 months before taking a call on his IPL career.

CSK vs GT, IPL 2023 Final: It's a fairytale finish, says Ambati Rayudu after playing his last IPL match TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 30, 2023, 09:30 (IST) Chennai Super Kings' batter Ambati Rayudu couldn't have asked for a better finish to his IPL career as he signed off on a title-winning note, with CSK clinching its fifth IPL trophy after a thrilling win over Gujarat Titans in the final on Monday in Ahmedabad.

IPL 2023 Purple Cap: Most wickets so far this season TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 30, 2023, 01:38 (IST) Over the years, the Purple Cap in the IPL has become one of the most prestigious prizes, associated with bowling excellence.

IPL 2023 Orange Cap: Most runs so far this season TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 30, 2023, 01:37 (IST) Over the years, the Orange Cap in the IPL has become one of the most prestigious prizes, associated with batting excellence.

Cricket enthusiasts swing and miss on IPL final match tickets TNN / May 26, 2023, 08:17 (IST) With the high-octane finale of the Indian Premier League (IPL) set to be held at the Narendra Modi stadium in Motera on Sunday, tickets have gone scarce well ahead of D-Day.

GT vs CSK: Eyes on MS Dhoni in the IPL 2023 final TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 28, 2023, 12:11 (IST) The cricketing world will turn its attention to Ahmedabad on Sunday evening for two reasons. One, whether Gujarat Titans successfully defend their IPL title or will it be Chennai Super Kings winning a fifth trophy. And two, will it be the last time that the iconic CSK captain MS Dhoni is seen on a cricket field as a player.

Chennai Super Kings better prepared for IPL final compared to past: Stephen Fleming TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 27, 2023, 22:14 (IST) Chennai Super Kings' head coach Stephen Fleming on Saturday expressed his confidence ahead of the IPL 2023 final against Gujarat Titans, stating that this time they are better equipped than ever before. Fleming also acknowledged that CSK's performance was affected by the prevailing conditions in the past.

IPL 2023 Stat Attack: Record 36 200-plus totals, MI have hit most boundaries TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 27, 2023, 18:51 (IST) To say that this has been a record breaking IPL season would be an understatement. As many as 8 200 plus totals while chasing alone in this edition. After 73 matches, now there is just one game left to play - the grand final between the defending champions Gujarat Titans and 4 time champions Chennai Super Kings.

GT vs MI, IPL 2023 Qualifier 2: The confidence Shubman Gill carries is amazing, says Hardik Pandya TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 27, 2023, 12:15 (IST) One of the hottest properties in international cricket currently, Shubman Gill has raised the bar with his prolific run in ipl 2023 and his century on Friday, which put Gujarat Titans into the final, has been lauded by his skipper Hardik Pandya as "one of the finest" he has ever seen in a T20 game.

IPL 2023: Hardik Pandya's calmness as a leader reminds Sunil Gavaskar of MS Dhoni TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 27, 2023, 11:01 (IST) For two consecutive seasons now, Hardik Pandya has led Gujarat Titans to an IPL final, and the all-rounder's leadership skills have commanded respect from all quarters, including the legend Sunil Gavaskar, who has likened Hardik's calmness to that of 'Captain Cool' MS Dhoni.
